extends Subplan

    • Method Detail

      • wrap

        public static LoopSubplan wrap​(LoopHeadOperator loopHead,
                               java.util.List<InputSlot<?>> inputs,
                               java.util.List<OutputSlot<?>> outputs)
        Creates a new instance with the given operators. Initializes the InputSlots and OutputSlots, steals existing connections, initializes the Subplan.slotMapping, and sets as inner Operators' parent.
